```{r}
library(rworldmap)
library(rworldxtra)
newmap <- getMap(resolution='low')
plot(newmap, xlim = c(min(terrorism$longitude, na.rm=T), max(terrorism$longitude, na.rm=T)), ylim = c(min(terrorism$latitude, na.rm=T), max(terrorism$latitude,na.rm=T)), asp=1)

points(terrorism$longitude, terrorism$latitude, col="red", cex=.05)

```
